entry.title: Flash Flood Watch issued August 29 at 4:49AM CDT until September 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: .The remnants of Hurricane Ida will move northeastward across the Tennessee Valley as a tropical depression on Monday night and Tuesday. This will bring a prolonged period of widespread moderate to locally heavy rainfall to the region from late Monday night through late Tuesday night. The threat for flash flooding will be highest with any thunderstorms that may occur during this timeframe.
